verses.verse: מַשָּׂ֥א <WH4853> mas-Sa The burden דְבַר־ <WH1697> de-var- of the word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- concerning יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El; for Israel נְאֻם־ <WH5002> ne-'um- saith יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD נֹטֶ֤ה <WH5186> no-Teh which stretcheth שָׁמַ֙יִם֙ <WH8064> sha-Ma-yim forth the heavens וְיֹסֵ֣ד <WH3245> ve-yo-Sed and layeth the foundation אָ֔רֶץ <WH776> 'A-retz, of the earth וְיֹצֵ֥ר <WH3335> ve-yo-Tzer and formeth רֽוּחַ־ <WH7307> Ru-ach- the spirit אָדָ֖ם <WH120> 'a-Dam of man בְּקִרְבּֽוֹ׃ <WH7130> be-kir-Bo. within פ Peh

הִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> hin-Neh Behold אָ֠נֹכִי <WH595> 'A-no-chi I שָׂ֣ם <WH7760> sam Behold I will make אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יְרוּשָׁלִַ֧ם <WH3389> ye-ru-sha-Lim Jerusalem סַף־ <WH5592> saf- a cup רַ֛עַל <WH7478> Ra-'al of trembling לְכָל־ <WH3605> le-chol to all הָעַמִּ֖ים <WH5971> ha-'am-Mim unto all the people סָבִ֑יב <WH5439> sa-Viv; round about וְגַ֧ם <WH1571> ve-Gam will also עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- is against יְהוּדָ֛ה <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah both against Judah יִֽהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> yih-Yeh become בַמָּצ֖וֹר <WH4692> vam-ma-Tzor when they shall be in the siege עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- be against יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> ye-ru-sha-Lim. [and] against Jerusalem

וְהָיָ֣ה <WH1961> ve-ha-Yah will come בַיּוֹם־ <WH3117> vai-yom- And in that day הַ֠הוּא <WH1931> Ha-hu I אָשִׂ֨ים <WH7760> 'a-Sim will I make אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יְרוּשָׁלִַ֜ם <WH3389> ye-ru-sha-Lim Jerusalem אֶ֤בֶן <WH68> 'E-ven stone מַֽעֲמָסָה֙ <WH4614> ma-'a-ma-Sah a burdensome לְכָל־ <WH3605> le-chol for all הָ֣עַמִּ֔ים <WH5971> ha-'am-Mim, for all people כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all עֹמְסֶ֖יהָ <WH6006> 'o-me-Sei-ha all that burden שָׂר֣וֹט <WH8295> sa-Rot will be severely יִשָּׂרֵ֑טוּ <WH8295> yis-sa-Re-tu; injured וְנֶאֶסְפ֣וּ <WH622> ve-ne-'es-Fu be gathered together עָלֶ֔יהָ <WH5921> 'a-Lei-ha, against כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> kol and all גּוֹיֵ֥י <WH1471> go-Yei though all the people הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> ha-'A-retz. of the earth

בַּיּ֨וֹם <WH3117> bai-Yom In that day הַה֜וּא <WH1931> ha-Hu he נְאֻם־ <WH5002> ne-'um- saith יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD אַכֶּ֤ה <WH5221> 'ak-Keh I will smite כָל־ <WH3605> chol every סוּס֙ <WH5483> sus every horse בַּתִּמָּה֔וֹן <WH8541> bat-tim-ma-Hon, with astonishment וְרֹכְב֖וֹ <WH7392> ve-ro-che-Vo and his rider בַּשִּׁגָּע֑וֹן <WH7697> bash-shig-ga-'on; with madness וְעַל־ <WH5921> ve-'al- over בֵּ֤ית <WH1004> beit upon the house יְהוּדָה֙ <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah of Judah אֶפְקַ֣ח <WH6491> 'ef-Kach and I will open אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- עֵינַ֔י <WH5869> 'ei-Nai, mine eyes וְכֹל֙ <WH3605> ve-Chol every ס֣וּס <WH5483> sus every horse הָֽעַמִּ֔ים <WH5971> ha-'am-Mim, of the people אַכֶּ֖ה <WH5221> 'ak-Keh and will smite בַּֽעִוָּרֽוֹן׃ <WH5788> Ba-'iv-va-Ron. with blindness

וְאָֽמְר֛וּ <WH559> ve-'a-me-Ru shall say אַלֻּפֵ֥י <WH441> 'al-lu-Fei And the governors יְהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah of Judah בְּלִבָּ֑ם <WH3820> be-lib-Bam; in their heart אַמְצָ֥ה <WH556> 'am-Tzah [shall be] my strength לִי֙ li יֹשְׁבֵ֣י <WH3427> yo-she-Vei The inhabitants יְרוּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> ye-ru-sha-Lim, of Jerusalem בַּיהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah-weh in the LORD צְבָא֖וֹת <WH6635> tze-va-'ot of hosts אֱלֹהֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH430> 'e-lo-hei-Hem. their God

בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> bai-Yom In that day הַה֡וּא <WH1931> ha-Hu I אָשִׂים֩ <WH7760> 'a-Sim will I make אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אַלֻּפֵ֨י <WH441> 'al-lu-Fei the governors יְהוּדָ֜ה <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah of Judah כְּֽכִיּ֧וֹר <WH3595> ke-chi-Yor like an hearth אֵ֣שׁ <WH784> 'esh of fire בְּעֵצִ֗ים <WH6086> be-'e-Tzim, among the wood וּכְלַפִּ֥יד <WH3940> u-che-lap-Pid and like a torch אֵשׁ֙ <WH784> 'esh of fire בְּעָמִ֔יר <WH5995> be-'a-Mir, in a sheaf וְאָ֨כְל֜וּ <WH398> ve-'A-che-Lu and they shall devour עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on יָמִ֧ין <WH3225> ya-Min on the right hand וְעַל־ <WH5921> ve-'al- and on שְׂמֹ֛אול <WH8040> se-Mol and on the left אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all הָעַמִּ֖ים <WH5971> ha-'am-Mim all the people סָבִ֑יב <WH5439> sa-Viv; round about וְיָשְׁבָ֨ה <WH3427> ve-ya-she-Vah shall be inhabited יְרוּשָׁלִַ֥ם <WH3389> ye-ru-sha-Lim and Jerusalem ע֛וֹד <WH5750> od again תַּחְתֶּ֖יהָ <WH8478> tach-Tei-ha sites בִּירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> bi-ru-sha-Lim. again in her own place [even] in Jerusalem פ Peh

וְהוֹשִׁ֧יעַ <WH3467> ve-ho-Shi-a' also shall save יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> Yah-weh The LORD אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אָהֳלֵ֥י <WH168> 'o-ho-Lei the tents יְהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah of Judah בָּרִֽאשֹׁנָ֑ה <WH7223> ba-ri-sho-Nah; first לְמַ֨עַן <WH4616> le-Ma-'an so לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- not תִגְדַּ֜ל <WH1431> tig-Dal do not magnify תִּפְאֶ֣רֶת <WH8597> tif-'E-ret that the glory בֵּית־ <WH1004> beit- of the house דָּוִ֗יד <WH1732> da-Vid, of David וְתִפְאֶ֛רֶת <WH8597> ve-tif-'E-ret and the glory יֹשֵׁ֥ב <WH3427> yo-Shev of the inhabitants יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <WH3389> ye-ru-sha-Lim of Jerusalem עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- above יְהוּדָֽה׃ <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah. [themselves] against Judah

בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> bai-Yom In that day הַה֗וּא <WH1931> ha-Hu, he יָגֵ֤ן <WH1598> ya-Gen defend יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Yah-weh shall the LORD בְּעַד֙ <WH1157> be-'Ad about יוֹשֵׁ֣ב <WH3427> yo-Shev the inhabitants יְרוּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> ye-ru-sha-Lim, of Jerusalem וְהָיָ֞ה <WH1961> ve-ha-Yah become הַנִּכְשָׁ֥ל <WH3782> han-nich-Shal and he that is feeble בָּהֶ֛ם <WH99999> ba-Hem בַּיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> bai-Yom among them at that day הַה֖וּא <WH1931> ha-Hu he כְּדָוִ֑יד <WH1732> ke-da-Vid; shall be as David וּבֵ֤ית <WH1004> u-Veit and the house דָּוִיד֙ <WH1732> da-Vid of David כֵּֽאלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> ke-lo-Him, [shall be] as God כְּמַלְאַ֥ךְ <WH4397> ke-mal-'Ach as the angel יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD לִפְנֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH6440> lif-nei-Hem. before

וְהָיָ֖ה <WH1961> ve-ha-Yah become בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> bai-Yom And it shall come to pass in that day הַה֑וּא <WH1931> ha-Hu; I אֲבַקֵּ֗שׁ <WH1245> 'a-vak-Kesh, [that] I will seek לְהַשְׁמִיד֙ <WH8045> le-hash-Mid to destroy אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all הַגּוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> hag-go-Yim, all the nations הַבָּאִ֖ים <WH935> hab-ba-'Im that come עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- against יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> ye-ru-sha-Lim. against Jerusalem

וְשָׁפַכְתִּי֩ <WH8210> ve-sha-fach-Ti And I will pour עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- over בֵּ֨ית <WH1004> beit upon the house דָּוִ֜יד <WH1732> da-Vid of David וְעַ֣ל׀ <WH5921> ve-'Al over יוֹשֵׁ֣ב <WH3427> yo-Shev and upon the inhabitants יְרוּשָׁלִַ֗ם <WH3389> ye-ru-sha-Lim, of Jerusalem ר֤וּחַ <WH7307> Ru-ach the spirit חֵן֙ <WH2580> chen of grace וְתַ֣חֲנוּנִ֔ים <WH8469> ve-Ta-cha-nu-Nim, and of supplications וְהִבִּ֥יטוּ <WH5027> ve-hib-Bi-tu and they shall look אֵלַ֖י <WH413> 'e-Lai about אֵ֣ת <WH853> 'et אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- whom דָּקָ֑רוּ <WH1856> da-Ka-ru; upon me whom they have pierced וְסָפְד֣וּ <WH5594> ve-sa-fe-Du for him as one mourneth עָלָ֗יו <WH5921> 'a-Lav, over כְּמִסְפֵּד֙ <WH5594> ke-mis-Ped mourns עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- over הַיָּחִ֔יד <WH3173> hai-ya-Chid, for [his] only וְהָמֵ֥ר <WH4843> ve-ha-Mer [son] and shall be in bitterness עָלָ֖יו <WH5921> 'a-Lav over כְּהָמֵ֥ר <WH4843> ke-ha-Mer for him as one that is in bitterness עַֽל־ <WH5921> 'al- over הַבְּכֽוֹר׃ <WH1060> hab-be-Chor. for [his] firstborn

בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> bai-Yom In that day הַה֗וּא <WH1931> ha-Hu, he יִגְדַּ֤ל <WH1431> yig-Dal shall there be a great הַמִּסְפֵּד֙ <WH4553> ham-mis-Ped mourning בִּיר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> bi-Ru-sha-Lim, in Jerusalem כְּמִסְפַּ֥ד <WH4553> ke-mis-Pad as the mourning הֲדַדְ־ ha-dad- רִמּ֖וֹן <WH1910> rim-Mon of Hadadrimmon בְּבִקְעַ֥ת <WH1237> be-vik-'At in the valley מְגִדּֽוֹן׃ <WH4023> me-gid-Don. of Megiddon

וְסָפְדָ֣ה <WH5594> ve-sa-fe-Dah shall mourn הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz, And the land מִשְׁפָּח֥וֹת <WH4940> mish-pa-Chot every מִשְׁפָּח֖וֹת <WH4940> mish-pa-Chot family לְבָ֑ד <WH905> le-Vad; apart מִשְׁפַּ֨חַת <WH4940> mish-Pa-chat the family בֵּית־ <WH1004> beit- of the house דָּוִ֤יד <WH1732> da-Vid of David לְבָד֙ <WH905> le-Vad itself וּנְשֵׁיהֶ֣ם <WH802> u-ne-shei-Hem apart and their wives לְבָ֔ד <WH905> le-Vad, themselves מִשְׁפַּ֤חַת <WH4940> mish-Pa-chat apart the family בֵּית־ <WH1004> beit- of the house נָתָן֙ <WH5416> na-Tan of Nathan לְבָ֔ד <WH905> le-Vad, itself וּנְשֵׁיהֶ֖ם <WH802> u-ne-shei-Hem apart and their wives לְבָֽד׃ <WH905> le-Vad. themselves

מִשְׁפַּ֤חַת <WH4940> mish-Pa-chat The family בֵּית־ <WH1004> beit- of the house לֵוִי֙ <WH3878> le-Vi of Levi לְבָ֔ד <WH905> le-Vad, itself וּנְשֵׁיהֶ֖ם <WH802> u-ne-shei-Hem apart and their wives לְבָ֑ד <WH905> le-Vad; themselves מִשְׁפַּ֤חַת <WH4940> mish-Pa-chat apart the family הַשִּׁמְעִי֙ <WH8097> hash-shim-'I of Shimei לְבָ֔ד <WH905> le-Vad, itself וּנְשֵׁיהֶ֖ם <WH802> u-ne-shei-Hem apart and their wives לְבָֽד׃ <WH905> le-Vad. themselves

כֹּ֗ל <WH3605> Kol, all הַמִּשְׁפָּחוֹת֙ <WH4940> ham-mish-pa-chOt All the families הַנִּשְׁאָר֔וֹת <WH7604> han-nish-'a-Rot, that remain מִשְׁפָּחֹ֥ת <WH4940> mish-pa-Chot every family מִשְׁפָּחֹ֖ת <WH4940> mish-pa-Chot family לְבָ֑ד <WH905> le-Vad; itself וּנְשֵׁיהֶ֖ם <WH802> u-ne-shei-Hem apart and their wives לְבָֽד׃ <WH905> le-Vad. themselves ס sa-Mek
